forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 13C. Winds SW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Windy with rain early. A mix of sun and clouds in the afternoon. High around 10C. Winds W at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. Windy at times. High around 50F. Winds W at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low near 5C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 42F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy. High around 60F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.
